book.synopsis: Thomas Covenant and Linden Avery begin their search for the One Tree that is to be the salvation of the Land. Only he could find the answer and forge a new Staff of Law--but fate decreed that the journey was to be long, the quest arduous, and quite possibly a failure....
book.title_long: The One Tree: (#2) (Second Chronicles of Thomas Covenant, Book 2)
book.dimensions: Height: 8.5 Inches, Length: 5.75 Inches, Width: 1 Inches
